short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: More control over the video player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds keyboard shortcuts to the video player on any website. Use space bar to pause and '[' and ']' to adjust speed by 0.1x increments. 'o' and 'p' to move forward and backward by 3 seconds. '\' make the video very fast for a short time.
